title: So you know that "haha LCS scripted xd" meme?
body:
For a split second during the pause in the clg vs flyquest game going on right now it showed 5 icons in a row on a kinda blurry banner in the back ground... it showed the icons in the order F/C/C/F/F  ... so if fly wins the last two games.... that would be a little crazy. I might have to find the video on youtube and see if I can find that banner thingy again....


TINFOIL HAT ON STANDBY
